bibl.title: Dimensions of Power: Callimachean Geopoetics and the Ptolemaic Empire. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Geopoetics and Politics: Knowing Places. - Geopoetics and Space: Going Places. - Chronopoetics: Creating Ptolemaic Time. - Ptolemaic Exclusions: Writing Out Egypt. - Conclusion: Panhellenic Poetry for Ptolemaic Readers.
bibl.seg: Asper Markus, Dimensions of Power: Callimachean Geopoetics and the Ptolemaic Empire. Avec résumé en anglais.
Benjamin Acosta-Hughes, Luigi Lehnus and Susan Stephens (Edd.), Brill's Companion to Callimachus (Leiden - Boston, 2011) pp. 155-177, 3 cartes.

Geopoetics and Politics: Knowing Places. - Geopoetics and Space: Going Places. - Chronopoetics: Creating Ptolemaic Time. - Ptolemaic Exclusions: Writing Out Egypt. - Conclusion: Panhellenic Poetry for Ptolemaic Readers.
